Wisdom: السَّيِّئُ الْخُلُقِ كَثِيرُ الطَّيْشِ مُنَغِّصُ الْعَيْشِ
enWisdom: The one who has a bad character is very impetuous and has a bitter life

Wisdom: سُوءُ الْخُلُقِ يُوحِشُ الْقَرِيبَ وَيُنَفِّرُ الْبَعِيدَ
enWisdom: Bad character alienates the near one and repels the distant one
One whose ineptness increases is scorned
One whose character is bad, his sustenance is restricted
One whose character is bad, his [own] family becomes fed up with him
One whose character is bad, his death is [considered a time of] happiness
One who is rude by nature, his surroundings are deserted
One whose character is bad, his [own] family becomes fed up with him

Wisdom: مَنْ سَاءَ خَلُقُهُ قَلَاهُ مُصَاحِبُهُ وَرَفِيقُهُ
enWisdom: One who is of bad character is detested by his companion and associate

Wisdom: مَنْ سَاءَ خُلُقُهُ أَعْوَزَهُ الصَّدِيقُ وَالرَّفِيقُ
enWisdom: One who is of bad character lacks friends and associates

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ تَحْسُنْ خَلَائِقُهُ لَمْ تُحْمَدْ طَرَائِقُهُ
enWisdom: One whose attributes are not good, his [methods and] ways will not be praised
There is no eminence in one who has a bad character

Wisdom: لَا وَحْشَةَ أَوْحَشُ مِنْ سُوءِ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: There is no loneliness worse than [that which is brought about by] bad character
